name: sass
description: I am going to learn SASS

scripts.sass: node-sass --include-path sass sass/main.sass public/css/main.css && node-sass --include-path sass sass/bootstrap/bootstrap.scss  public/css/bootstrap.css
scripts.sassMinifi: node-sass --include-path sass sass/main.sass public/css/main.min.css --output-style compressed && node-sass --include-path sass sass/bootstrap/bootstrap.scss  public/css/bootstrap.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.buildcss: npm run sassMinifi | npm run prefix

author: ashikjs
